configuration.description: Configure your CyberArk EPM account, proxy and logging settings.

entity.label: Account Name
entity.help: Enter a unique name for this account.

validators.errorMsg: Length of Account name should be between 1 and 50
Account Name must begin with a letter and consist exclusively of alphanumeric characters and underscores.

entity.label: EPM Dispatcher Server URL
entity.help: Enter the dispatcher server URL. e.g., https://login.epm.cyberark.com

validators.errorMsg: URL should start with 'https' as only secure URLs are supported.

entity.label: Username
entity.help: Enter the username for this account.

validators.errorMsg: Length of username should be between 1 and 200

entity.label: Password
entity.help: Enter the password for this account.

validators.errorMsg: Length of password should be between 1 and 8192
Maximum length allowed for host is 4096
Maximum length allowed for username is 50

options.saveValidator: function(formData) { if(!formData.proxy_enabled || formData.proxy_enabled === '0') {return true; } if(!formData.proxy_url) { return 'Proxy Host can not be empty'; } if(!formData.proxy_port) { return 'Proxy Port can not be empty'; } return true; }

entity.label: Log Level

validators.errorMsg: Log level must be one of: DEBUG, INFO, WARN, ERROR

entity.help: (DEBUG, INFO, WARN or ERROR)

configuration.title: Configuration

entity.label: Name
entity.help: Enter a unique name for the input.

validators.errorMsg: Input Name must begin with a letter and consist exclusively of alphanumeric characters and underscores.
Maximum length allowed for field Input Name is 150

entity.label: Account
entity.help: Select the account using which you want to collect the events.

entity.label: Use existing data input?
entity.help: Select whether or not to reuse the checkpoint file already available for the named input.

entity.label: Start Date
entity.help: Start Date to start the data collection, in UTC timezone. Format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ (Default is 6 minutes ago).

validators.errorMsg: Invalid date format specified for 'Start Date'

entity.label: Interval

validators.errorMsg: Interval must be either a non-negative number, CRON interval or -1.
Interval must be between 360 and 3600

entity.help: Interval for this input (in seconds).

entity.label: Index
entity.help: An index is a type of data repository. Select the index in which you want to collect the events.

validators.errorMsg: Maximum length allowed for index is 80
Index Names may contain only letters, numbers, underscores, or hyphens. They must begin with a letter or number
